comments: The numbers not of the form x^2+y^2+4z^2.
references: M. A. Bennett and B. Reznick, Positive rational solutions to x^y = y^{mx} ..., Amer. Math. Monthly, 111 (No. 1, 2004), 13-21.
L. J. Mordell, A new Waring's problem with squares of linear forms, Quart. J. Math., 1 (1930), 276-288 (see p. 283).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 02 2000
